scripts.runMongoCont: docker run -dp 27017:27017 --network mybridgenet --name contmongo -v shared_database:/data/db -e MONGO_INITDB_ROOT_USERNAME=rm  -e MONGO_INITDB_ROOT_PASSWORD=rm -e MONGO_INITDB_DATABASE=rmdb mongo
scripts.deleteMongoCont: npm run stopMongoCont && docker rm contmongo
scripts.runApiCont: docker run -dp 5000:2000 --name contapi --network mybridgenet -e PORT=2000 imageapi:1.0
